ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Welcome!!”{PAUSE}“I just can't believe it.
I never thought a monster like
Weapon really existed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Welcome!”{PAUSE}“I was just starting to get worried…
You see our sales were pretty bad today.”
